name: DaikinD’SmartHomeLite
0:
”Alexa, turn on dsmarthome lite”
”Alexa, turn on sleep”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Daikin, the World’s Leading Airconditioning Brand brings to you D'SmartHome, the First Smart Home Solution by Airconditioning Manufacturer to complement your lifestyle and assist greater living.

Like a dream butler, D'SmartHome attends to the various living convenience you sought for in your active lifestyle and pays attention to the minor details providing the peace of mind.

Features:
• Support Z-Wave devices control, room control and scene control
• Allow alarm notification for each Z-Wave device and each scene
